name: ConnectionStatusBar
description: Top bar to show a 'no internet' connection status
note: Run on real device for best results
The component requires installing the '@react-native-community/netinfo' native library

props.name: label
props.description: Text to show as the status

props.name: onConnectionChange
props.description: Handler to get connection change events propagation

props.name: allowDismiss
props.description: Whethere to allow the user to dismiss

props.name: useAbsolutePosition
props.description: Use absolute position for the component
